00026 #include "OgreMovableObject.h"
00027 
00028 namespace Ogre {
00029 
00030     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00031     MovableObject::MovableObject()
00032     {
00033         mParentNode = 0;
00034     }
00035     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00036     void MovableObject::_notifyAttached(SceneNode* parent)
00037     {
00038         mParentNode = parent;
00039     }
00040     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00041     SceneNode* MovableObject::getParentNode(void)
00042     {
00043         return mParentNode;
00044     }
00045     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00046     bool MovableObject::isAttached(void) const
00047     {
00048         return (mParentNode != 0);
00049 
00050     }
00051 
00052 
00053 
00054 
00055 }
